ANDS-Grants.description: This project critically examines how local non-government organisations affect decentralisation in India and Indonesia. It offers new understandings of the potential for development agencies to transform the meanings, practices and identities that shape how citizens experience local governance.
ANDS-Grants.title: Discovery Early Career Researcher Award - Grant ID: DE130100468
subjects: rural development in practice in india and indonesia
